Elikutty @eli.kutty üÜï Name -Eliza Keyton.

Learn Malayalam with EliKutty is about making Malayalam fun and accessible for all, as well connecting learners together with valuable insight from the Malayalee community.

On Instagram, Eliza posts fun video clips of lessons, skits, and interviews with people of interest. There are opportunities to engage in discussion and learn more about Malayalee culture, as well as share personal struggles and triumphs learning the language.

EliKutty doesn't offer any kinds of services, but works within the community to collaborate and promote other Malayalam content creators and their services.

Eliza really loves the word Thaimozhi, a Dravidian origin word for mother tongue. She hopes that more people can learn and appreciate Malayalam's roots and also appreciate their thaimozhi.
